node_1: when you wish upon a star
edge: Cynthia Erivo performed the song 'When You Wish Upon a Star' as the Blue Fairy in the Pinocchio (2022 live-action film) soundtrack composed by Alan Silvestri.
Alan Silvestri composed the score for the Pinocchio (2022 live-action film) directed by Guillermo del Toro.
Tom Hanks as Geppetto performed the song 'Pinocchio, Pinocchio' in the Pinocchio (2022 live-action film) soundtrack composed by Alan Silvestri.
Kyanne Lamaya as Fabiana performed the song 'I Will Always Dance' in the Pinocchio (2022 live-action film) soundtrack composed by Alan Silvestri and Glen Ballard.
Luke Evans as the Coachman performed 'The Coachman to Pleasure Island' in the Pinocchio (2022 live-action film) soundtrack composed by Alan Silvestri.
The songs 'Little Wooden Head' from the original Pinocchio (1940) film did not make the cut in the Pinocchio (2022 live-action film) soundtrack.
The song 'Give a Little Whistle' from the original Pinocchio (1940) film did not make the cut in the Pinocchio (2022 live-action film) soundtrack.
The song 'Hi-Diddle-Dee-Dee' from the original Pinocchio (1940) film had its reprise in the Pinocchio (2022 live-action film) soundtrack, but its title did not make the cut.
